home.intro:
Discover your unique music story.

Explore your top tracks, artists, albums, genres, and musical eras. Dive into your personalized Spotify insights!
home.login_prompt: Login with your Spotify account to start...
home.top_tracks_desc: Instantly see your top 50 most-played tracks and relive the songs that build your vibe.
home.top_artists_desc: Explore your top 20 most-listened artists and see who's been dominating your playlists.
home.top_albums_desc: Dive into your top 10 most-listened albums and see what's been on repeat.
home.top_genres_desc: Discover your top 10 most-listened music genres and see which styles define your unique taste.
home.top_eras_desc: Discover your top 5 most-listened eras and reveal your music history.
home.demo_subtitle: Tracks, artists, albums, genres, and eras — insights tailored to your listening.

footer.disclaimer:
Music data, artist images, and album covers are provided by Spotify. Spotify is a trademark of Spotify AB.
We are not affiliated with Spotify AB or its partners.

artists.title: Top artists
artists.popularity_description: The popularity of the artist is between 0 and 100, with 100 being the most popular. It is calculated from the popularity of all the artist's tracks.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
Welcome to Auralytics. Your privacy is critically important to us. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information when you use our service. Our service is an independent application that utilizes the Spotify API to provide insights and is not associated with Spotify AB, its partners, or associates.

By using our service, you agree to the collection and use of information in accordance with this policy.

collect.title: Information We Collect
collect.personal_data_footer: This information is collected to enable core functionalities and improve your user experience. We do not sell, trade, or share your personal information with third parties.
cookies_items: Essential Cookies: Necessary for the website to function properly.
Analytics Cookies: Provided by third-party services like Google Analytics to track user behavior and improve the service.
Advertising Cookies: Used to deliver targeted ads through services such as Google Ads.
collect.cookies_footer: You can manage or disable cookies in your browser settings, but this may impact some features of our service.

usage.title: How We Use Your Data
items: To enable and maintain our service.
To personalize your user experience.
To detect, prevent, and address security or technical issues.
For any other purposes disclosed at the time of collection or with your consent.

thirdparty.title: Third-party Services
items: Spotify API: To fetch and display your Spotify-related data.
Google Analytics: For site traffic analysis.
Google Ads: For serving personalized ads.
thirdparty.footer: Please refer to the respective privacy policies of these services for more details.

retention.title: Data Retention
retention.content: Your data will retain in our database system only for 1 hour. After that, the data will expire and be automatically eliminated.

children.title: Children's Privacy
children.content: Our service is not directed to anyone under the age of 18. We do not knowingly collect personal data from children. If you believe that your child has provided personal information, please contact us immediately, and we will take steps to delete such data.

accuracy.title: Data Accuracy Statement
accuracy.content: While we strive to ensure accuracy, these insights may not perfectly reflect your listening habits and should be used for reference only.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.content: We may update this Privacy Policy from time to time. Any changes will be posted on this page with an updated "Last Updated" date. Continued use of the service after any changes constitute your acknowledgment of the updated policy.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any further information, please contact us via musicinsightsforspotify@gmail.com.

introduction.title: Introduction
introduction.content:
Welcome to Auralytics! By accessing or using our website, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you do not agree with any part of these Terms, please do not use our service.

Our service provides Spotify-related data insights for personal, non-commercial use. We are an independent platform and are not affiliated, endorsed, or sponsored by Spotify AB or any of its partners.

eligibility.title: Eligibility
items: Be at least 18 years old.
Have a valid Spotify account to connect with our service.
Agree to comply with these Terms and any applicable laws or regulations.

responsibilities.title: User Responsibilities
responsibilities.intro: By using our service, you agree to:
items: Use the service only for lawful purposes and in compliance with these Terms.
Provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information when using the service.
subitems: Attempting to hack, disrupt, or damage the website or its services.
Using automated tools (e.g., bots, scrapers) to collect data from our website.
Misusing the Spotify API data provided through our service.

prohibited.title: Prohibited Activities
items: Modifying, distributing, or reproducing any part of our website or its content without permission.
Using the service to engage in fraudulent, illegal, or unauthorized activities.
Reselling or commercializing the data or insights provided by our service.

ip.title: Intellectual Property
ip.content: All content on our website, including but not limited to designs, text, graphics, logos, and software, is the property of Auralytics and is protected by intellectual property laws.
items: Copy, distribute, or publicly display our content without prior written consent.
Use our branding or trademarks in any manner without authorization.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.intro: To the fullest extent permitted by law:
items: Auralytics is provided "as is" and "as available" without warranties of any kind, express or implied.
subitems: Any unauthorized access to your personal data.

termination.title: Termination
items: Suspend or terminate your access to the service at any time, without notice, for violating these Terms.
Modify or discontinue any aspect of the service without prior notice.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.content: For any further information, please contact us via musicinsightsforspotify@gmail.com.
